title: Cleanliness and Water Vocabulary
goal: Learn words for cleanliness and water.

sections.content:
New Material (5-7 min)

New Vocabulary

Lojban Place Structure English
jinsa x1 is clean/pure of dirt x2 clean
curve x1 is pure/unmixed of x2 pure
dirgo x1 is a drop/droplet of liquid x2 drop
djacu x1 is water/H2O water

Cleanliness

lo zdani cu jinsa

The house is clean.

lo djacu cu curve

The water is pure.

Water and Drops

mi viska lo dirgo be lo djacu

I see a drop of water.

ti djacu

This is water.

Combining with Yesterday's Words

lo djacu cu glare .ije lo djacu cu jinsa

The water is hot. And the water is clean.

mi djica lo lenku djacu

I want cold water.

Key Point

jinsa means clean (free from dirt), while curve means pure (unmixed). Both describe quality.
sections.title: New Material (5-7 min)

sections.content:
Practice (4-5 min)

Exercise 1: Cleanliness

Translate:

  1. The room is clean.
  2. The water is pure.
  3. My hands are clean.
Answers
  1. lo kumfa cu jinsa
  2. lo djacu cu curve
  3. lo mi xance cu jinsa

Exercise 2: Water Descriptions

Translate:

  1. I drink water.
  2. The water is cold and clean.
  3. I see a water drop.
Answers
  1. mi pinxe lo djacu
  2. lo djacu cu lenku je jinsa
  3. mi viska lo dirgo be lo djacu

Exercise 3: Combine All New Words

Translate:

  1. I want hot pure water.
  2. The drop is small.
  3. The house is clean and dry.
Answers
  1. mi djica lo glare curve djacu
  2. lo dirgo cu cmalu
  3. lo zdani cu jinsa je sudga

items.text: The water is cold and clean.

items.answer: `mi viska lo dirgo be lo djacu`

items.text: The house is clean and dry.

sections.content:
Conversation Challenge (1-2 min)

Say aloud:

  1. "The water is clean." → lo djacu cu jinsa
  2. "I see a drop." → mi viska lo dirgo
  3. "This is pure water." → ti curve djacu

Summary

You learned four more words: jinsa (clean), curve (pure), dirgo (drop), djacu (water).
